thread.title: Excellent apartments in a great location
thread.title_full: Excellent apartments in a great location - Review of The French Quarters Guest Apartments, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Carl2112
title: Excellent apartments in a great location
text:
Spent 5 nights here in mid March and loved the place. Decorated in a New Orleans style, it's attached to the Bourbon Bar and Grill on West 46th St, also known as Restaurant Row. The room was spacious and spotless, particularly the bathroom, which had a walk-in shower. The staff were all helpful and polite to a fault. The breakfast was a basic continental breakfast, so if you want something cooked, you would have to go elsewhere. We generally couldn't fault the place though and would highly recommend these apartments.
Room Tip: Ask for a room that's not directly above the bar. See more room tips
